# 中国企业2020：人工智能应用实践与趋势

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zhongguo-qiye-2020-rengongzhineng-yingyong-shijian-yu-qushi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zhongguo-qiye-2020-rengongzhineng-yingyong-shijian-yu-qushi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zhongguo-qiye-2020-rengongzhineng-yingyong-shijian-yu-qushi
zhongguo-qiye-2020-rengongzhineng-yingyong-shijian-yu-qushi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zhongguo-qiye-erlingerling-rengongzhineng-yingyong-shijian-yu-qushi
zhongguo-qiye-erlingerling-rengongzhineng-yingyong-shijian-yu-qushi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
